# Program 2
# Author: Zabet, William
# Reviewed by: Ajayi, Oluwasegun E.
#
# Word counter at GPR2
0500 0E01
0501 0500
#
# Sentence Counter at GPR3
0502 0F01
0503 0502
#
# Load in search word to GPR0
0504 F400
0505 0504
#
# Sentence #1
# 'This'
# Load in first word to GPR1
#
0506 F500
0507 0506
#
# Using TRR to see if GPR0 and GPR2 are equal, if so cc=1
#
0508 5840
0509 0508
#
# Using JCC, If cc = 1, then the word is found and the contents of GPR2 and GPR3 are returned
# If not, then we continue to do this on each word, incrementing sentence# and word# accordingly
#
050A 311F
050B 050A
#
# 'is'
050C F500
050D 050C
#
050E 0E02
050F 050E
#
0510 5840
0511 0510
#
0512 311F
0513 0512
#
# 'a'
0514 F500
0515 0514
#
0516 0E03
0517 0516
#
0518 5840
0519 0518
#
051A 311F
051B 051A
#
# 'first'
051C F500
051D 051C
#
051E 0E04
051F 051E
#
0520 5840
0521 0520
#
0522 311F
0523 0522
#
# 'sentence'
0524 F500
0525 0524
#
0526 0E05
0527 0526
#
0528 5840
0529 0528
#
052A 311F
052B 052A
#
# Sentence 2
#
052C 0F02
052D 052C
#

#
